      • uriFromPath

        public static URI uriFromPath(String path)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException

        Create a URI from a path. This is similar to calling new URI(null, null, path, null) with the URISyntaxException converted to a IllegalArgumentException.

        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        the uri
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string violates RFC 2396

      • queryAsMap

        public static Map<String,List<String>> queryAsMap(URI uri)

        Returns the query part of a URI as map. Note that query parts can have multiple entries with the same key.

        Parameters:
        uri - the uri
        Returns:
        the map

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        the result
